thread.title: Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning
thread.title_full: Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning

title: Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning
text:
Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning Not all heroes wear capes. Post to Facebook Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning Not all heroes wear capes.  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/atlanta-falcons-fan-buried-bury-jersey-super-bowl-51-patriots-bad-luck-nfl/   Join the Nation's Conversation To   Falcons fan buries jersey with a hilarious warning Andrew Joseph 6:57 p.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 
Atlanta Falcons fan CJ Scott hangs his head in his hands at Taco Mac restaurant in Atlanta after watching on television the New England Patriots beat Atlanta in the NFL Super Bowl 51. (Photo: AP) 
The Atlanta Falcons blew a 25-point lead and allowed 31 unanswered points in their Super Bowl 51 loss to the New England Patriots. As we've discussed extensively, Atlanta sports teams just have the worst luck . 
One fan, in all his misery, stepped up to do something about it. This fan buried the jersey he wore during Super Bowl 51 and attached a note. A friend of mine buried his Falcons jersey today... pic.twitter.com/CK7ikOlGfV — Belle Es You (@SouthernbeLLSU) February 7, 2017 
But let's not overlook the note because it carried a critically important message: THIS JERSEY IS BAD LUCK. 
The note reads: 
If you have un-earthed this, you have not found anything vintage or cool. This shirt is bad luck…Seriously re-bury it immediately. 
If you are still curious and don't believe me, Google Super Bowl 51. This shirt blew a 25 point lead. 
Put it back! Trust me! 
It probably wouldn't hurt if every Falcons fan followed along and discarded of the gear they wore during Super Bowl 51. Nobody wants to carry that kind of bad luck.
